00021 /*
00022  * lustre/utils/liblustreapi_ladvise.c
00023  *
00024  * lustreapi library for ladvise
00025  *
00026  * Author: Li Xi <lixi@ddn.com>
00027  */
00028 
00029 #include <stdlib.h>
00030 #include <unistd.h>
00031 #include <stdbool.h>
00032 #include <sys/time.h>
00033 #include <sys/types.h>
00034 #include <sys/stat.h>
00035 #include <fcntl.h>
00036 #include <sys/syscall.h>
00037 #include <sys/ioctl.h>
00038 #include <errno.h>
00039 
00040 #include <lustre/lustreapi.h>
00041 #include <lustre/lustre_idl.h>
00042 #include "lustreapi_internal.h"
00043 
00044 /*
00045  * Give file access advices
00046  *
00047  * \param fd       File to give advice on.
00048  * \param ladvise  Advice to give.
00049  *
00050  * \retval 0 on success.
00051  * \retval -errno on failure.
00052  */
00053 int llapi_ladvise(int fd, unsigned long long flags, int num_advise,
00054                   struct lu_ladvise *ladvise)
00055 {
00056         int rc;
00057         struct ladvise_hdr *ladvise_hdr;
00058 
00059         if (num_advise < 1 || num_advise >= LAH_COUNT_MAX) {
00060                 errno = EINVAL;
00061                 llapi_error(LLAPI_MSG_ERROR, -EINVAL,
00062                             "bad advice number %d", num_advise);
00063                 return -1;
00064         }
00065 
00066         ladvise_hdr = calloc(1, offsetof(typeof(*ladvise_hdr),
00067                              lah_advise[num_advise]));
00068         if (ladvise_hdr == NULL) {
00069                 errno = ENOMEM;
00070                 llapi_error(LLAPI_MSG_ERROR, -ENOMEM, "not enough memory");
00071                 return -1;
00072         }
00073         ladvise_hdr->lah_magic = LADVISE_MAGIC;
00074         ladvise_hdr->lah_count = num_advise;
00075         ladvise_hdr->lah_flags = flags & LF_MASK;
00076         memcpy(ladvise_hdr->lah_advise, ladvise, sizeof(*ladvise) * num_advise);
00077 
00078         rc = ioctl(fd, LL_IOC_LADVISE, ladvise_hdr);
00079         if (rc < 0) {
00080                 llapi_error(LLAPI_MSG_ERROR, -errno, "cannot give advice");
00081                 return -1;
00082         }
00083         return 0;
00084 }
